mapper.select: select idx, fk_teamwon_idx, subject, content , to_char(startdate, 'yy.mm.dd') as startdate , to_char(lastdate, 'yy.mm.dd') as lastdate , fk_folder_idx, groupno, depth, category, status, importance , case when trunc(startdate) < sysdate and sysdate < trunc(lastdate)+1 then 1 when trunc(lastdate)+1 < sysdate then -1 else 0 end as dayCnt , (select count(*) from tbl_folder where status in (1, 0) and idx != F.idx start with idx = F.idx connect by prior idx = fk_folder_idx) as downCnt , (select count(*) from tbl_folder_teamwon where fk_folder_idx = F.idx) as ftCnt , (select count(*) from tbl_folder_comment where fk_folder_idx = F.idx) as fcCnt , (select count(*) from tbl_folder_file where fk_folder_idx = F.idx) as ffCnt from tbl_folder F where status in (0, 1) and fk_teamwon_idx in (select idx from tbl_teamwon where fk_team_idx = #{team_idx}) start with fk_folder_idx = 0 connect by prior idx = fk_folder_idx order siblings by category asc

select idx, fk_teamwon_idx, subject, content , to_char(startdate, 'yy.mm.dd') as startdate , to_char(lastdate, 'yy.mm.dd') as lastdate , fk_folder_idx, groupno, depth, category, status, importance , case when trunc(startdate) < sysdate and sysdate < trunc(lastdate)+1 then 1 when trunc(lastdate)+1 < sysdate then -1 else 0 end as dayCnt , (select count(*) from tbl_folder where status in (1, 0) and idx != F.idx start with idx = F.idx connect by prior idx = fk_folder_idx) as downCnt , (select count(*) from tbl_folder_teamwon where fk_folder_idx = F.idx) as ftCnt , (select count(*) from tbl_folder_comment where fk_folder_idx = F.idx) as fcCnt , (select count(*) from tbl_folder_file where fk_folder_idx = F.idx) as ffCnt from tbl_folder F where idx = #{idx}

select idx, fk_teamwon_idx, subject, content , to_char(startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate , to_char(lastdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as lastdate , fk_folder_idx, groupno, depth, category, status, importance , case when trunc(startdate) < sysdate and sysdate < trunc(lastdate)+1 then 1 when trunc(lastdate)+1 < sysdate then -1 else 0 end as dayCnt , (select avg(importance) from tbl_folder where idx != F.idx start with idx = F.idx connect by prior idx = fk_folder_idx) as importanceAvg from tbl_folder F where idx = #{idx}
